@description.name: @description
@description.body:
A widget cell renderer manages a pool of widgets to render cells in a
{@link qx.ui.virtual.layer.WidgetCell} layer.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Get a widget instance to render the cell

@param.name: @param
@param.body: data {var} Data needed for the cell to render.
@param.description: Data needed for the cell to render.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: states {Map} The states set on the cell (e.g. selected, focused, editable).
@param.description: The states set on the cell (e.g. selected, focused, editable).

@description.name: @description
@description.body:
Release the given widget instance.

Either pool or dispose the widget.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: widget {qx.ui.core.LayoutItem} The cell widget to pool

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Update the states of the given widget.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: widget {qx.ui.core.LayoutItem} The cell widget to update

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Update the data the cell widget should display

@param.name: @param
@param.body: widget {qx.ui.core.LayoutItem} The cell widget to update
